Detailed Description

The thread used to install the packages.

Member Function Documentation

void wxWebUpdateInstallThread::AbortInstall (   )  [inline]
 

Aborts the current installation.

void wxWebUpdateInstallThread::BeginNewInstall (   )  [inline]
 

Starts a new installation.

This function must be called only when this thread is not installing anything else.

void * wxWebUpdateInstallThread::Entry (   )  [virtual]
 

Installs the packages.

int wxWebUpdateInstallThread::GetInstallationCount (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the number of packages successfully installed by this thread.

wxWebUpdateInstallThreadStatus wxWebUpdateInstallThread::GetStatus (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the current status of the thread.

please note that this status is completely independent from the running/paused status of a simple wxThread. The returned status refers only to the action currently performed by wxDownloadThread when it's running.

bool wxWebUpdateInstallThread::InstallationWasSuccessful (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if the last installation was successful.

bool wxWebUpdateInstallThread::IsInstalling (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if this thread is installing a package.

bool wxWebUpdateInstallThread::IsWaiting (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns TRUE if this thread is running but it's not installing anything.

The number of packages installed by this thread.

wxWebUpdateInstallThreadStatus wxWebUpdateInstallThread::m_nStatus [protected]
 

The value of this variable represents the current thread status; see the wxWebUpdateInstallThreadStatus enum for more info.

wxWebUpdateDownload* wxWebUpdateInstallThread::m_pDownload
 

The package which contains the wxWebUpdateAction to be executed.

This is a pointer to avoid unwanted copies (both for performances and to avoid duplicate log messages).

wxEvtHandler* wxWebUpdateInstallThread::m_pHandler
 

The wxEvtHandler which will receive our wxDT_NOTIFICATION events.
